game.name: FALL GIRLS
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 스포츠
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: FALL GIRLS is a casual arcade runner with unique setting.It`s a competition, where you should pass the levels one by one.You will play as a female protagonist.
game.shortDescriptionEn: FALL GIRLS is a casual arcade runner with unique setting.It`s a competition, where you should pass the levels one by one.You will play as a female protagonist.

reviewHighlights.text: 움직이는 사진이 너무 이쁘다 잘만들었다 사진 4번째부턴 못깰것같다. 최고다
